item.title: How to add spec to a weapon [317]
item.dc:creator: @bluescapepkz bluescapepkz
item.description:
@bluescapepkz wrote:

How do i add a spec to a weapon? (on a 317)
the weapon iâ€™m trying to add spec to is tri gs (id code 11333)
Added this to client.java

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11333 && specialAmount > 49){ setAnimation(5870); specialAmount -= 50; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); getHit(30); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); hitDiff = misc.random(75); }

And this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11333 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 5870); }

What else should i do?

Read full topic
